Description:
Job ResponsibilitiesReview Loan documents and process transactions as per SLA
Perform activities such as review of underwriting documents, Deal closing and loan servicing activities 
Interpret and understand legal documents pertaining to underwriting and perform due diligence to comply with the lending requirements
Process Financial Statements, Appraisal reports, Borrowing Base Certificate, Compliance Certificate, Mortgage documents,  Credit Agreement and abstract critical data
Perform analysis of Financial Statements and complete spreading as per the guidelines
Performs required research on the received request within stipulated timelines
Follows up on deficient documentation with relevant stake-holders       
Meet and exceed the turnaround time and accuracy rate as per the specified target
Ensure adherence to the quality control standards that have been set for the process
   Required Qualifications, Skills and Capabilities6 months to 2 year of work experience, preferably in Banking/Mortgage/Financial Analysis and Loan Operations
You should be open to work in night shifts, Strong verbal & written communication to effectively communicate with various stakeholders and across levels
Manage the complex requests with minimum supervision and independently make the decisions related to the process
Preferable knowledge on aspects of Financial Statements, MIS reporting, Credit Agreement and other loan documents
ACBS/VLS/LIQ servicing system knowledge preferred, Demonstrate the attributes of flexibility and accountability
Excellent interpersonal skills to work effectively in team environment, Attention to detail and problem solving skills, Client relationship and time management
MS Office skills, Strong problem solving skills to undertake analysis, resolve issues/problems related to the process, Risk & control mindset, Experience in managing small projectsJPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.
